name: Castle of Life
overview: Find the Lapora of Life. A brave knight without fear is the protagonist of this fantastic story set in the "Castle of Life". He will have to face a thousand dangers caused by the spirits, emissaries of the evil force, to be able to reach the magical Amphora of Life. Later, he will have to face other pitfalls before reaching the room of the evil one who has the power to turn into a monstrous dragon. If you come out victorious in the fight with the dragon, you can reach and save your beloved princess. Move as quickly as possible before someone notices a hostile presence in the room or kills you by throwing a huge boulder on your head. Don't waste your strength because you only have 4 lives available. Don't get distracted and always be ready with reflections! An unofficial English translation was done by Hokuto Force on March 21, 2016.
